name: FAR STAR (itch)
description:
BUILD NUMBER 1

This is a regular action RPG adventure!

In Far Star, your role is to guide MC, an average kid whose dream is to explore the universe and unravel its secrets!

One day, things became strange after he met an interesting creature...

Far Star's BUILD 1 has quite a lot to offer! Check it out:

  • Battles packed with action! 
  • Many areas to explore and treasures to discover!
  • Weapons and accessories with different effects!
  • Friends you'll make along the way!
  • A few hours of content to prepare you and MC for the future...

Planned features:

  • Full Power-up system
  • New moves
  • Armors
  • Ducka's sketchy crafting system
  • More out-of-battle activities
  • Welp, the rest of the game...

CONTROLS:

  • Move - WASD
  • Interact - ENTER
  • Menu - M
  • The rest, you'll learn on your own...

TWITTER; HERE!
 YOU CAN FIND THE GAME FILES BELOW!
** I RECOMMEND PLAYING IN FULLSCREEN MODE
